com.github.jonathanxd.iutils.string

Class ToStringHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.jonathanxd.iutils.string.ToStringHelper

  • public final class ToStringHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for toString methods. Prefix and suffix is appended when the method toString() is called. Delimiter is appended when append(CharSequence) method is called, and the toString() removes the last delimiter appended.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ToStringHelper add(java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object value)
      Add a 'key to value' string (append null if value is null).
      ToStringHelper addOptional(java.lang.String key, java.util.Optional<java.lang.Object> value)
      Add a 'key to value' string, this method will unbox de value from Optional if present, or append null if not.
      ToStringHelper append(java.lang.CharSequence sequence)
      Append a sequence to helper.
      static ToStringHelper defaultHelper()
      Create a helper instance with recommended settings.
      static ToStringHelper defaultHelper(java.lang.String start)
      Create a helper instance with recommended settings and a initial string.
      static ToStringHelper helper()
      Create a helper instance without start, delimiter, prefix and suffix.
      static ToStringHelper helper(java.lang.String start)
      Create helper instance with initial string, and no delimiter, prefix and suffix.
      static ToStringHelper helper(java.lang.String start, java.lang.String delimiter)
      Create helper instance with initial string and a delimiter.
      static ToStringHelper helper(java.lang.String start, java.lang.String delimiter, java.lang.String prefix, java.lang.String suffix)
      Create helper instance with initial string, delimiter, prefix and suffix.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this string helper.

      • helper

        public static ToStringHelper helper(java.lang.String start,
                                    java.lang.String delimiter,
                                    java.lang.String prefix,
                                    java.lang.String suffix)
        Create helper instance with initial string, delimiter, prefix and suffix.
        Parameters:
        start - Initial string (delimiter will not be appended)
        delimiter - Delimiter.
        prefix - Prefix (string that is appended at start of the builder (after initial string).
        suffix - Suffix (string that is appended at end of the builder).
        Returns:
        Helper instance with initial string and a delimiter.

      • add

        public ToStringHelper add(java.lang.String key,
                          java.lang.Object value)
        Add a 'key to value' string (append null if value is null). This method adds quote to string values.

        value - Value.
